summary: A journey seen through the eyes of a young woman with epilepsy that brings extraordinary hallucinations as she searches for her long lost brother.
cast: Agyness Deyn|Christian Cooke|Paul Anderson|Tom Georgeson|Dean Bone|Christina Berriman Dawson|Alice Lowe|Sarah Martin|Sharon Percy|Millie Taylforth|Jake Gibbons|Nigel Travis|Stephen Robson|Saffron Coomber|Peter-Hugo Daly|Seamus O'Neill|Elliott Sinclair|David Smith|Callum Coates|Melissa Sinden|Lenora Crichlow|Ben Batt|Jimmy Roussounis|Kal Wells|Julie Conlon|Amanda Winthorpe|Julian Firth|Alan Billingham|Paul Bond|Neil Eddy|Stuart Ferrol|Harriet Ghost|Susan Hughes|Doroteja Kolar|Lindsey Maughan|Andy McAdam|Vicki Milligan|Ford Prefect|John Scott|Niamh Stephenson-Dickinson|Julia Stringer|David Thomas Summerside|Freya Tora|Will Willett
title: Electricity
